pages.text: Since you cannot mine stone blocks at this stage you need to either find a cave or build a primitive shelter. Putting up some cobblestone blocks as the base of temporary walls might be a good extra protection in the early days, just remember that once you've placed a block of cobblestone you won't be able to break it until you have metals tools, so place them only where you need them (building near a cliff-face or on a hill may help you in designing early defenses).

You can break a cobblestone block with just your fist, but it will take an extremely long time to do so, and you will get nothing in return.$(br)Tip: Cobblestone falls sideways just like dirt, so it can't be used to make tall, 1 thick walls without proper support.
